import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { }

Welcome to FoodSaver!


Bridge the gap and reduce food waste!



   


Featured Meals

Delicious meals available for reservation



Healthy Rice Bowl


Avocado Deli Soup


Tofu Curry

Impact Statistics


Meals Reserved

3,456

350kg



User Reviews

Gordon Ramsay   @gordonramsay   31m
Great App! Found amazing meals and highly recommend it.

José Andrés  @joseandres  31m
FoodSaver has made a big difference in my community. Love the concept.

Bobby Flay   @bobbyflay  31m
Easy to use, and the meals are always delicious. Thank you FoodSaver!
